nice work man... thnx... v/a perfect (nobody should expect it as HD)

First off - Thx for the up....sincerely appreciated.

2nd....If you're desperate to see the movie, this is a great copy to get until a straight rip comes along. If you are looking for an archive copy (hey, some people are completists), this definitely isn't it. 

Regardless of what many comments have said, this is not a single source release. It is not b-r.

The first half (ish....not going to go back and check) seems to come from something official.....Seems basically perfect. After a very brief glitchy bit, the source definitely changes.....My honest guess is cam. The switch is definitely noticeable, and the quality of the second source is sub-par. Additionally, in the beginning few minutes, though the V is perfect, there are syncing issues - they are resolved quickly though. 

Sound is a bit tinny, but okay. 

A/V (1st half) - 7 or 8/9
A/V (2nd half) - 7 or 8/5 or 6

(not counting the sync issue in the first few mins)

Thx again for the upload and to seeders everywhere
